messages.content: Hello there! How may I help you today?
I want to visit yellowstone national park from SF this August with my parents. Can you provide me a 5 day itinerary?

Sure! Here's a 5-day itinerary for visiting Yellowstone National Park from San Francisco:

Day 1: arrival in San Francisco and check-in to your hotel
Day 2: explore the city, including the Golden Gate Bridge, Fisherman's Wharf, and Pier 39
Day 3: drive to Bozeman, Montana to begin your trip to Yellowstone
Day 4: travel through the Rocky Mountains on scenic Highway 12, stopping to explore charming towns along the way
Day 5: arrive at the entrance of Yellowstone National Park, tour the geothermal areas, and visit Old Faithful

I hope you enjoy your trip to Yellowstone!
I'm departing from SF and I want to spend all 5 days in yellowstone.

If you are travelling from SF and plan to spend all 5 days in Yellowstone, you can follow the itinerary outlined above for Day 1 to 4. On Day 5, you can continue exploring Yellowstone by visiting the Grand Canyon of the Yellowstone, Old Faithful, and other attractions. Alternatively, you can extend your stay in Yellowstone by staying in Bozeman, MT for an extra day.
